data.meta_site_name: Laura Ingalls Wilder Historic Home & Museum
data.text:
Description

Begins with one- and two-syllable words and progresses to more difficult words – covering about third grade through fifth grade reading levels. Contains stories on the Bible, American history, manners, animals, courage, honesty, God, and the love of reading.

Format: Hardcover

Pages: 242

Author: William Holmes McGuffey

Age: 8, 9, 10, 11

Grade: 3rd, 4th, 5th

Topic: Reading

Admission

Children 5 and Under – FREE

Children 6 to 17 – $8.00

Adults 18 & Over – $18.00

Open House Style Touring Can Be Expected With Large Visitor Numbers

No Pets Allowed – No Smoking
